name: It's about Time (UltiGames)
description:
Gameplay

It’s About Time is a first-person cooperative game built around the mechanic of freezing and unfreezing time in creative applications. One player is able to freeze and unfreeze interactables in the map to create a way forward, while the other freezes enemy turrets in place as protection from harm.

Plot

The story of It’s About Time focuses onto two companions with the ability to locally manipulate time using advance technology. The two differ in their applications of this technology, giving them different opportunities.

-The first is the WAYFINDER, who is able to freeze and unfreeze the passage of time on items indefinitely, doing so for the purposes of navigation and creating a path through the environment.
-The second is the PALADIN, who is capable of freezing turrets that try to attack the two. Because trying to freeze these machines requires more effort, the Paladin can only freeze the turrets for a few seconds before they unfreeze.

The Wayfinder and the Paladin are exploring what should be an abandoned factory, that has since come back to life. In doing so, the defence systems have reactivated, posing a threat to the duo and forcing them to try and escape to their ship at the end of the level.

Controls

In It's about Time, the Wayfinder uses Mouse and Keyboard, while the Paladin uses a controller.

WAYFINDER

Movement [WASD]

Jump [SPACE]

Freeze [R CLICK]

Unfreeze [Q]

PALADIN

Movement [LEFT STICK]

Jump [A/X]

Freeze [RIGHT TRIGGER]
